translation.en: [Geoffrey] Good morning, Lusaka!
This is Reporter Geoffrey bringing you the Lusaka News!
translation.de: Hier ist Reporter Geoffrey mit Neuem aus Lusaka!

translation.en: While the sun may be shining brightly, last night
translation.de: Heute scheint die Sonne, doch gestern gab es einen Tornado,

translation.en: another mysterious tornado struck.
translation.de: doch gestern gab es einen Tornado,

translation.en: Its powerful winds knocked out power for hours.
-Iye, Geoffrey, I know. -[man] Hey, iwe!
Elo, I was busy finishing my project for the Science fair ka.
Geoffrey, do you realize Mr. Magedzee
translation.de: Hr. Magedzee wird auch da sein!

translation.en: -is going to be there? -[grunts]
translation.de: Hr. Magedzee wird auch da sein! Ah!

translation.en: These tricky twisters were previously unheard of in Zambia, and indeed, Africa.
translation.de: Bisher waren Tornados in Sambia und in ganz Afrika unbekannt.

translation.en: So why are they happening, Geoffrey?
Blackouts from load shedding were bad enough. Now tornados?
translation.de: Erst die Stromausfälle, jetzt auch Tornados?

translation.en: [groans] Likando, why did I join the majorettes?
translation.de: Warum wollte ich zu den Majoretten?

translation.en: It's bad enough being the new kid at school.
translation.de: Ich bin doch schon die Neue.

translation.en: Ah-ah, Monde.
Did you forget you were captain of your old majorette team?
translation.de: Du warst Kapitänin deines alten Teams.

translation.en: You've got this, little sis.
These tornados are just another disaster battering Lusaka.
With an increase in crime and daily blackouts,
the people are calling for Mayor Sikazwe's resignation.
-[chanting] No more blackouts! -Please! No more load shedding!
Sisi, if Mayor Sikazwe gets fired, you could lose your job.
translation.de: Wenn er gefeuert wird, verlierst du deinen Job.

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
I don't plan on being the mayor's assistant for long.
I see much bigger and better things for us soon.
translation.de: Für uns zwei habe ich Größeres geplant.

translation.en: Iwe Monde! Get over here now!
[sighs] Coming, Marjory.
This is Chipo with Kamiji Secondary's very own star player of the fútbol team,
translation.de: Hier ist Chipo mit dem Fußballstar der Kamiji-Oberschule,

translation.en: This is Zee with Kamiji Secondary School's very own Chipo Hamoonga,
translation.de: Hier ist Zee mit Chipo Hamoonga von der Kamiji-Oberschule,

translation.en: who is crushing on Komana Mwiinga.
Stop, ekse! -[Zee laughing]
[Temwe] One vitumbuwa. Two vitumbuwa. Who am I kidding?
translation.de: Eine Vitumbuwa. Zwei Vitumbuwas. Ach, wem mache ich was vor?

translation.en: Thank you, Ba Saasa!
-[Mr. Nkwashi] Hey! -Huh? Temwe Chiti! Are you stealing food?
Principal Nkwashi, what do you take me for?
translation.de: Direktor Nkwashi, für wen halten Sie mich?

translation.en: -A delinquent? -Hm.
I've got my eye on you, Chiti.
What's the other eye doing?
[Geoffrey] Lusaka hasn't endured this kind of turmoil in 20 years.
translation.de: So was hat Lusaka seit 20 Jahren nicht erlebt.

translation.en: Who can keep our city safe?
Mama K's Juice Ya Cheapa!
-T.O.M.I., come online please. -T.O.M.I. here, Mama K.
The threat is growing, T.O.M.I.
We need our new team today to keep our people safe!
Commencing final footage collection to confirm our candidates.
-Mama K! -[hiccups] Oh!
-Are you all set up? -Oh, yes, Mr. Nkwashi, thank you.
translation.de: Mama K! Sind Sie bereit? Ja, Hr. Nkwashi, danke.

translation.en: Um, if you don't mind, I may need to speak to you later
about volunteers for my fruit and vegetable stand.
Volunteers? Anything to help a member of our little community.
-[slurping] -[Mr. Magedzee] Hello, everybody! Hello, bantu banga.
I am Lee Magedzee, owner of Magedzee Power Corporation.
translation.de: Lee Magedzee von Magedzee Power Corporation.

translation.en: Thank you for inviting me to Kamiji Secondary School's Science Fair.
translation.de: Danke für die Einladung zu eurem Forschungswettbewerb.

translation.en: At MPC, we are committed to bringing power to the people!
translation.de: Wir bei MPC bringen die Energie zu den Menschen!

translation.en: I am beyond excited to see your inventions
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf eure Erfindungen

translation.en: and discover if one of you
will be the next recipient of our MPC scholarship!
The power to save our world starts with you students.
translation.de: Ihr, unsere Schüler, seid die Rettung unserer Welt.

translation.en: Yes!
Mr. Magedzee!
[clears throat] I am Komana Mwiinga.
I would like to apply for the MPC Scholarship.
So nice to meet you.
May I present to you my Carbon Capture machine.
Very intriguing. I'm all ears.
Well, the concept is based on--
Another power station attack.
And the tornado is headed here.
T.O.M.I., focus on the tornado.
translation.de: T.O.M.I., flieg näher ran. Wir brauchen Informationen.

translation.en: -We need to know what is really going on. -[T.O.M.I.] Yes, Mama K.
translation.de: T.O.M.I., flieg näher ran. Wir brauchen Informationen. Ja, Mama K.

translation.en: Attention! Take shelter under the stands! Follow me!
translation.de: Achtung! Sucht Schutz unter den Ständen! Folgt mir!

translation.en: [Ba Saasa] Help! Somebody! I'm trapped.
-[gasps] -Help!
Hey! -Help Mr. Nkwashi. -Huh?
Help me, please!
But Ba Saasa! And the vitumbuwa!
translation.de: Was ist mit Ba Saasa? Und den Vitumbuwas!

translation.en: Help!
-Help! -I've got them!
translation.de: Hilfe! Ich mach das! Lady, darf ich das borgen?

translation.en: [grunting] May I use this, Gogo?
translation.de: Ich mach das! Lady, darf ich das borgen?

translation.en: Ba Saasa, use this!
Help!
-Mr. Nkwashi, pull yourself to safety. -Don't tell me what to do, Chiti!
translation.de: -Hr. Nkwashi, ziehen Sie sich raus. -Nicht in dem Ton, Chiti!

translation.en: But I'm trying to help you! [screams]
Hm. I should have saved the vitumbuwa.
Help! Help!
Help!
-Let's go, Marjory. -Eh! Let's go who?
Let's go, Captain.
-[yells] -I've got you, Chipo!
-Run! -[Chipo yelps]
Gogo, run!
[Geoffrey] A freak tornado ran through the city, striking another power station
translation.de: Wieder fegte ein Tornado durch ein Kraftwerk

translation.en: and wreaking havoc on Kamiji Secondary School.
-Tensions in Lusaka are rising… -[coughing]
…with endemic blackouts bringing life to a standstill, and repeated…
translation.de: das Leben in Lusaka zum Stillstand und…

translation.en: Komana. [coughing]
Here you go, Ta. Use this.
-Catch your breath. -[inhales]
-Are you okay now? -Yes. Thank you.
Mr. Nkwashi just called. You are required to attend a meeting.
translation.de: Hr. Nkwashi rief an. Er will dich sprechen.

translation.en: Are you in trouble?
Huh? What? No. Wait. When is this meeting?
translation.de: Was? Nein. Wann will er mich sprechen?

translation.en: Mr. Magedzee is giving me another chance to present my Carbon Capture machine.
translation.de: Ich soll Hr. Magedzee meinen CO2-Abschneider zeigen.

translation.en: At his office in just a few hours!
-Mr. Nkwashi said, "Right now." -[exclaims] And gave me an address.
translation.de: Hr. Nkwashi meinte, sofort. Und zwar hier.

translation.en: It's not at school. Where is this?
So I guess I'm not the only one with detention.
translation.de: Ich sitze wohl nicht als Einzige nach.

translation.en: Yeah, you have the wrong girl. Me? Detention? Aweh. We don't mix.
translation.de: Das ist ein Irrtum. Ich und Nachsitzen? Wir passen nicht zusammen.

translation.en: Me neither. I just moved here.
Oh. Hi. I'm Monde.
[Zee] Hey. Zee.
If we're not serving detention, why did Mr. Nkwashi send us here?
translation.de: Warum hat uns Hr. Nkwashi hergebeten?

translation.en: Because I asked him to.
Oh! The Juice Ya Cheapa lady.
Muli bwanji, girls.
[girls] Bwino bwanji, Gogo.
I am Mama K. This is Chomps.
translation.de: Ich heiße Mama K. Das ist Chomps.

translation.en: -[bleats] -[Mama K] And you have arrived at my fruit and vegetable stand.
translation.de: Und ihr seid an meinem Obststand.

translation.en: You four have been offered
this great opportunity to give back to your community.
translation.de: etwas für eure Gemeinde zu tun.

translation.en: -Opportunity for free labor, ka. -[giggles]
You will save the world working here.
translation.de: Eure Arbeit wird die Welt retten.

translation.en: Eh? Here?
Mm, Gogo. I have an important appointment this afternoon.
translation.de: Lady, ich habe einen wichtigen Termin.

translation.en: From what time to what time are we saving the world?
Right now. But not right here.
Come with me.
What's that story with the old lady luring kids with sweets?
translation.de: Eine alte Frau, die Kinder mit Süßem anlockt?

translation.en: She's like a little old gogo, ha. Totally harmless.
translation.de: Die alte Dame ist doch total harmlos.

translation.en: -Little old gogo? -Hmm. That's how people disappear.
translation.de: Harmlose alte Dame? So verschwinden Leute.

translation.en: [Mama K] Follow me, please.
Mama weh.
We are going to disappear. [yelps]
As you know, girls,
mysterious tornados have been causing destruction across Lusaka.
But there is more to it than meets the eye.
Abeg. You're one of those conspiracy theorists
with an underground bunker.
This is where you are going to save the world.
translation.de: Hier werdet ihr die Welt retten.

translation.en: What?
-[Temwe] Are you serious? -[Komana] Ati, what?
-What? -[bleats]
Wait, does Mr. Nkwashi know about this?
No. He just thinks you're volunteering at the stand above.
translation.de: Nein. Er glaubt, ihr helft am Obststand aus.

translation.en: This is my little secret.
[Komana] What is this place?
Many years ago,
I was part of a secret government agency, working in these very headquarters,
translation.de: saß hier eine Geheimorganisation, für die ich arbeitete.

translation.en: fighting evil forces in our city.
Sha! This gogo is lekker.
Eh, eh, eh. Did you just say evil forces? Evil how?
As I was saying,
things are not what they seem. T.O.M.I., pull up drone footage from yesterday.
translation.de: der Schein trügt. T.O.M.I, zeige die Aufnahmen.

translation.en: Artificial intelligence.
Artificial boyfriend. [chuckles]
Ah. Technological Operations Management Interface. T.O.M.I.
T.O.M.I., zoom in, please.
[T.O.M.I.] Zooming in.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Is that a guy caught in the tornado?
translation.de: Wurde der Mann von dem Tornado erfasst?

translation.en: He's not caught in it. [beeping] -[Komana] Basa, he's controlling it.
translation.de: Nein, er wurde nicht davon erfasst. Er steuert ihn!

translation.en: [Mama K] Yes! The tornados are not a freak act of Mother Nature.
They are an act of a supervillain.
Supervillain?
Wait, wait, wait! How? Why?
I'm not sure yet. We need to find out and put a stop to him.
translation.de: Das müssen wir herausfinden und ihn aufhalten.

translation.en: We? Did you just say "we"? She just said "we."
Mm. That's what she said. We.
I have been observing you keenly for weeks. [chuckles]
[Temwe] Observing us? You mean like, stalking?
It's called gathering intelligence. And based on what I've gathered,
translation.de: Ich sammelte Informationen. Und denen nach zu urteilen,

translation.en: it is clear that you are the elite super squad I need
to help save Lusaka.
You mean, superheroes!
Uh, yeah. Okay. Superheroes.
And based on my astute observations,
translation.de: Und ich fertigte für jede von euch

translation.en: I have built super suits distinctive to each of you.
-[gasps] -What? This is so…
[Mama K] They've been designed to boost each of your natural abilities.
translation.de: Die Anzüge werden eure Fähigkeiten verstärken.

translation.en: They'll keep you safe and protect your identity.
translation.de: Sie beschützen euch und eure Identität.

translation.en: All this talk about a suit. So what's with the watch?
translation.de: Sie reden von Anzügen. Was soll die Uhr?

translation.en: Can I get a "whoa"?
[girls] Whoa.
Oh! Sorry, Chomps!
[laughing] Oh, it happens.
Now, girls, it is extremely important
that you keep your secret identities secret.
No one can know.
-Not your sister. -[gasps] [Mama K] Not your father. Not your bestie friend.
translation.de: Weder zu deiner Schwester, deinem Dad noch zum Kumpel.

translation.en: Not your vitumbuwa vendor.
You know about Ba Saasa?
It is for their protection as much as yours.
translation.de: Zu eurem und zu ihrem Schutz.

translation.en: [girls] Yeah. Okay.
It has been 20 years since Lusaka needed a team of heroes.
translation.de: Nach 20 Jahren braucht Lusaka wieder ein Heldenteam.

translation.en: If we want our people to survive, they need a team they can depend on.
translation.de: Die Leute müssen sich auf uns verlassen können.

translation.en: But why us, Mama K?
[chuckles] It's not every day
a 60-year-old lady sees four young women running into danger, shwi!
translation.de: vier Mädchen so mutig auf die Gefahr zurennen sehen.

translation.en: Without thinking of themselves.
But being a hero takes more than super strength suits
translation.de: Aber ein Held braucht mehr als Anzüge

translation.en: and high-tech gear.
It takes character. Together,
translation.de: Er braucht Stärke. Ihr alle bringt etwas ein, das dieses Team braucht.

translation.en: you possess the innate qualities this team requires.
translation.de: Ihr alle bringt etwas ein, das dieses Team braucht.

translation.en: Komana, K-Bongo, the lover of knowledge.
Zee, Za-Mpezi, fast like lightning.
translation.de: Zee, Za-Mpezi, schnell wie der Blitz.

translation.en: Monde, M-Kozo, the bringer of peace.
And Temwe, T-Mlilo, full of fire.
Aww! I wanted to be T-Licious.
But T-Mlilo is awesome. Fiyah!
translation.de: Aber T-Mlilo ist auch super! Feurig!

translation.en: The mind, body, soul, and heart of our team.
translation.de: Der Geist, der Körper, die Seele und das Herz.

translation.en: Together, you are my Team 4.
-Okay! -So, is Team 4 ready to save Lusaka?
-Ya, ya, ya! -Yes, Mama K.
-Yes. Mm. -Yeah!
T-Mlilo in the byu byu!
Eh, byu byu? As in, building?
translation.de: Byu byu? So wie hier im Haus?

translation.en: Eya boom! You got it, Mama K. Za-Mpezi in the byu byu.
translation.de: Genau, Mama K! Za-Mpezi ist hier.

translation.en: Me too! M-Kozo in the byu byu!
My appointment! I'm going to be late.
translation.de: Mein Termin! Ich komme zu spät!

translation.en: K-Bongo, wait!
-Are you in… -The byu byu?
-No. -[girls] What?
I need to get that scholarship from Mr. Magedzee.
Mama K, I'm sorry.
Wait, ba jobee,
you are leaving all these nice, nice things for the ka scholarship?
translation.de: du willst deswegen auf all das verzichten?

translation.en: My entire future depends on it.
And my dad.
[sniffles] He's sick.
This is not how I'm going to save the world.
I can't… I can't do it all.
-But-- -Ah, ah. Let her go.
The water may be boiling on the stove,
but no one can force you to pour in the mealie meal.
You have to be hungry.
So, T-Mlilo's Team 3! -[bleats] -How does everyone feel about that?
translation.de: Okay, T-Mlilos Team 3! Wie finden wir das?

translation.en: [Mama K] Ah! What is happening, T.O.M.I.?
-[girls] Oh ,no! -Girls, it's Go Go time!
[Komana] Thank you for letting me present my project to you.
translation.de: Danke für die Chance, Hr. Magedzee.

translation.en: [Mr. Magedzee] Of course, Komana.
We can't let a tornado get in the way of science, can we?
translation.de: Ein Tornado wird uns nicht aufhalten.

translation.en: No, sir.
This is my solar-powered Carbon Capture machine.
My machine doesn't just capture carbon.
It uses electricity generated from solar panels
translation.de: und er benutzt den Strom aus den Solarzellen

translation.en: to split CO2 into energized carbon monoxide and oxygen.
translation.de: zum Aufspalten von CO2 in Kohlenmonoxid und Sauerstoff.

translation.en: Once carbon monoxide is released, it's combined with hydrogen
translation.de: Wird das Monoxid freigelassen, verbindet es sich

translation.en: to produce safe, synthetic carbon-based fuels.
Uh-huh. So we can purify dangerous CO2 from the atmosphere
translation.de: Wir befreien die Luft von CO2

translation.en: while producing clean fuel and oxygen at the other end.
It's brilliant. How did you choose solar as your power source?
translation.de: Und warum nimmst du Sonne als Energiequelle?

translation.en: Well, I looked into a number of energy resources.
translation.de: Ich habe mehrere in Betracht gezogen.

translation.en: Geothermal, wind,
even an extremely rare mineral called Zambianite.
Ah, yes, I've heard of that mineral.
But ultimately, in Lusaka, the sun was the most reliable.
translation.de: Aber in Lusaka ist die Sonne am zuverlässigsten.

translation.en: Very true. And why a portable version of the Carbon Capture machine?
translation.de: Stimmt. Und warum ist dein CO2-Abschneider tragbar?

translation.en: My dad developed breathing problems from the pollution,
and other people might be suffering the same way.
That's what I love!
Technology made to benefit the lives of others.
Astounding, Komana! I am impressed!
While we have a few candidates left to interview,
I can tell you that you are in the top running.
translation.de: aber du stehst ganz oben auf der Liste.

translation.en: -[people screaming] -We'll have the final results soon.
translation.de: aber du stehst ganz oben auf der Liste. Bald wissen wir mehr.

translation.en: [gasps] Dad! Um, Mr. Magedzee, I have to go. Thank you, sir.
translation.de: Dad! Ich muss los, Hr. Magedzee. Danke.

translation.en: Thank you for… coming, Komana.
Ta? Ninzi?
-Komana. -Ta? Are you okay?
translation.de: Komana. Dad, geht es dir gut? Ich bin hier.

translation.en: I'm here, I'm here.
translation.de: Dad, geht es dir gut? Ich bin hier.

translation.en: [Komana] Help! Help!
-Did you hear that? -Look, over there!
Imwe, tiyeni!
-[grunting] -Komana! I need help!
Whati?
Huh. Well. That's new.
Ta!
Komana… You know these girls?
Get him in the van. I'll take him to hospital.
Komana. Thank you, daughter.
-Ta. -[coughing]
-You saved my dad's life. -[Mama K] Don't worry, Komana.
translation.de: Ihr habt ihn gerettet. Keine Sorge, Komana. Er wird wieder.

translation.en: He's going to be fine.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, Komana. Er wird wieder.

translation.en: Mama K, I can save the world in different ways.
translation.de: Ich kann die Welt auf verschiedene Arten retten.

translation.en: I see that now.
-Is it too late to… -[chuckles]
Suit up!
Yah!
Bantu banga, we need to get to whoever is inside controlling this!
translation.de: Holen wir uns den Kerl, der das Ding steuert!

translation.en: T-Mlilo! Let's use your ribbon, like you did with Mr. Nkwashi.
translation.de: T-Mlilo! Nutze das Band, wie bei Hr. Nkwashi.

translation.en: Great idea. [grunts]
Are you hurt?
Just my pride. And my butt.
translation.de: Nur mein Stolz. Und mein Hintern.

translation.en: We got him!
What do we do?
What is that?
It's a brazier!
Look at you, K-Bongo!
Breaking up that tornado's cold air with a firebomb.
translation.de: Feuer gegen die Kaltluft des Tornados.

translation.en: Genius, ekse. Genius.
All this trouble has been caused by some old man.
translation.de: All der Ärger wegen dieses alten Mannes.

translation.en: Old?! Old?! I am Storm Drain.
Creator of chaos!
-King of climate! -[beeping]
[chuckles] I will not be defeated!
Looks like you just were, Grandpa.
I can't believe we pulled that off.
[Mama K] Job well done! Congratulations, Team 4!
[Geoffrey] The public was pleasantly surprised
when a group of heroes calling themselves Team 4
finally put an end to the natural disaster that was not so natural after all.
translation.de: diese nicht ganz natürliche Naturgewalt gestoppt haben.

translation.en: So, who are these heroes, and where do they come from?
Perhaps our pleas for help
have finally been answered.
Be careful, Lusaka.
Those pleas will soon be drowned out by my power.
translation.de: Diese Rufe gehen bald in meiner Macht unter.
